message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $95 for your product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $95 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $105.  This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a deal closer to my budget. I would like to offer $90 for your product.

Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're not going to agree on a price.  I'm willing to go down to $98 for this product, but that's my absolute final offer. If we can't come to an agreement, I'm going to have to move on to another buyer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $95 for your product, which is within my budget.
